name: Project Manufacturing Cost
query:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT p.name as "Project:Link/Project:100",
    p.modified as "Modified:Date:100",
    se.bom_no as "BOM:Link/BOM:100",
    b.operating_cost as "Plan Operating Cost:Currency:100", 
    b.raw_material_cost as "Plan Material Cost:Currency:100",
    (p.total_operating_cost-b.operating_cost ) as "Delta Operating Cost:Currency:100",
    (p.total_consumed_material_cost-b.raw_material_cost ) as "Delta Material Cost:Currency:100",
    p.total_operating_cost as "Real Operating Cost:Currency:100",
    p.total_consumed_material_cost as "Real Consumed Cost:Currency:100",
    p.scrap_qty as "Scrap Qty:percent:100"
    from tabProject p LEFT JOIN `tabStock Entry` se ON se.project = p.name JOIN tabBOM b ON b.name = se.bom_no WHERE se.purpose="Manufacture" AND p.modified between %(start_date)s and %(end_date)s
UNION
SELECT p.name as "Project:Link/Project:100",
    p.modified as "Modified:Date:100",
    po.bom as "BOM:Link/BOM:100", 
    b.operating_cost as "Plan Operating Cost:Currency:100", 
    b.raw_material_cost as "Plan Material Cost:Currency:100",
    (p.total_operating_cost-b.operating_cost ) as "Delta Operating Cost:Currency:100",
    (p.total_consumed_material_cost-b.raw_material_cost ) as "Delta Material Cost:Currency:100",
    (total_purchase_cost+p.total_operating_cost)  as "Real Operating Cost:Currency:100",
    p.total_consumed_material_cost as "Real Consumed Cost:Currency:100",
    p.scrap_qty as "Scrap Qty:percent:100"
    from tabProject p LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` po ON po.project = p.name LEFT JOIN tabBOM b ON b.name = po.bom WHERE po.bom IS not NULL AND p.modified between %(start_date)s and %(end_date)s
) prj
ORDER BY 2 DESC
